Author: Mmaarten
Name: &3&lAn Experimental Mess
Description: Recent developments ask for a serious analysis of the situation. Get ready to test and don't make a mess...
Comment: This script will be started by the H.A.P.P.Y. controller.

Welcome back [PLAYER]! I must congratulate you on your excellent leadership on the &8&lZekrom&r heist.
NewDialog.&3H.A.P.P.Y: &3Statera&r has been trying to bring him home for over &ltwo decades&r!
&8&lVidar&r must be very proud of you. He requested you would come see him in his office.

Objective: Speak with Vidar in his office on the third floor

NewDialog.&8&lVidar: Ah! There you are [PLAYER]!
Congratulations are in order. Your latest mission was unbelievably successful!

NewDialog.[PLAYER]: I am happy &8&lZekrom&r is finally back home.

NewDialog.&8&lVidar: Care to join me in our lab?
I want you to see what we have been working on all this time.

Objective: Get to the Testing Labs on Floor 2

NewDialog.&8&lVidar: Don't forget, to reach the lab, cross the bridge with the orange curtains to your right.
I am down here [PLAYER].
Welcome to the lab. Here we will be conducting our research on &8&lZekrom&r.
These test will be used to see how different Pokémon change their behaviours while under &8&lZekrom&r’s power.

NewDialog.[PLAYER]: What exactly do you mean by &otests&r?

NewDialog.&8&lVidar: Well for example, if &8&lZekrom&r feels threatened, will the Pokémon turn on their trainer? Will they stop obeying in battle?
We will use your Pokémon and see how this goes.
Your &dAura&r should have an effect on this as well.
Prepare for the first test. Make sure you only have 1 pokemon in your party.
Step in the safety cage when you are ready.

Objective: Step into the safety cage in the Testing room (Make sure to only have 1 Pokémon!)

NewDialog.&8&lVidar: Alright. Now get your Pokémon out and try to attack.
&lWATCH OUT!
Are you okay?
Your Pokémon attacked you!
Good... That was interesting!
They saw you wanted to attack &8&lZekrom&r so they attacked you instead...

NewDialog.&3&lEvan: H.A.P.P.Y detected some new arrivals coming through the sea-line.
&3Cobalion&r left our trackers and our &5Crobats&r lost sight of the others.

NewDialog.&8&lVidar: &3Cobalion&r huh? So the Swords of Justice have made an appearance then.
&eAstrid&r must have called to them. This really throws a wrench in our plans.
More than likely they’ve already made contact with &dDanielle&r as well, considering her &dAura&r...
It’s time to move into the final steps of our plan.
&8&lZekrom&r and &f&lReshiram&r are not the only two powerful Pokemon in Zeinova.
'The Ultimate' is rumoured to be resting in the Frozen Island.
With our current research on &8&lZekrom&r we should be able to capture 'The Ultimate'.
It will give us the power to Unite the lands.
&eAstrid&r can not stop us. Let’s go to my office, [PLAYER]! No time to waste!
It is time to inform the other &3Statera&r members.
&3H.A.P.P.Y.&r! Create a secure connection! Broadcast my message to all members.

SendMessage:
&2&lIncoming Pokégear Call

  &bStatera HQ&r is trying to reach you.

NewDialog.&3H.A.P.P.Y: Attention all &3Statera&r Employees! Your favourite robossistant H.A.P.P.Y here! We have a special announcement from our CEO, &8&lVidar!
NewDialog.&8&lVidar: Dear colleagues, friends, family,
It is with great pleasure that I address you all today.
For years, we have been working towards unity in the region and today is the day.
We are about to embark on a dangerous venture, and what lies ahead is a Great War, with &6Sophro&r standing in our way.
Thank you all, for the years you’ve stood with me. This will not be easy, but 20 years of research has prepared us for it.
None of this could be done without you all, our loyal companions, and friends. We are not taking this final step alone, however.
Standing right beside us in this last effort is none other than [PLAYER]!
So get ready to unite the region forever and be ready to move when the moment is there.
Together we can do this! &3&lSTATERA FOREVER&r!
Our last step, [PLAYER], is you.
You must go defeat the final gym and then go to Elite Four and challenge Zeinova's Champion.
You must become &lour&r Champion.

Objective: Go beat the final gym and become the Elite Four Champion

NewDialog.&d&lDanielle: You defeated me once but you won't defeat me again!

Objective: Battle Danielle to keep your title of Regional Champion

NewDialog.&8&lVidar: Congratulations [PLAYER], you’ve made great strides in this endeavour, and you will take us to the Stars!

NewDialog.[PLAYER]: &dDanielle&r showed up at some point... I almost defeated her but then a large bolt of lightning struck her!

NewDialog.&8&lVidar: That doesn't matter. What matters is that you won and now you are the Champion of the Region!
Here, take these rewards, Champion [PLAYER]!
